member.summary: The control that is used to display histogram

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.UI.HistogramBox.AddHistogram(System.String,System.Drawing.Color,Emgu.CV.Mat,System.Int32,System.Single[])
member.summary: Add a plot of the 1D histogram. You should call the Refresh() function to update the control after all modification is complete.
member.param: The name of the histogram
The drawing color
The 1D histogram to be drawn
The size of the bin
The ranges

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.UI.HistogramBox.GenerateHistograms(Emgu.CV.IImage,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate histograms for the image. One histogram is generated for each color channel. You will need to call the Refresh function to do the painting afterward.
member.param: The image to generate histogram from
The number of bins for each histogram

member.summary: Remove all the histogram from the control. You should call the Refresh() function to update the control after all modification is complete.
